SerializableEvent.name: Keep Watching 2
SerializableEvent.text: "The European Federation and the Afro-American Commonwealth are hosting an emergency summit with the leaders of the body modification industry. Restrictions on past body modifications are expected to be announced in the following days..."

SerializableAnswer.name: Acceptance
SerializableAnswer.text: Well, nothing I can do now but wait and see

SerializableEvent.name: TV: The terrorist attack
SerializableEvent.text: The government vlogger is good. She actually seems touched: "2476 dead. We are all still processing our fellow citizens brutal murder by crazed, heavily modified terrorist..."

SerializableAnswer.name: Keep watching
SerializableAnswer.text: I need to know. Are there any more restrictions coming?

SerializableAnswer.name: Turn it off
SerializableAnswer.text: I know what they are going to say...

SerializableEvent.name: my first mod
SerializableEvent.text: The terrorist modified, yes, and now mods are illegal. I could loose my job if they found out...

SerializableAnswer.name: empathy
SerializableAnswer.text: I got an empathy reader. I can read people like open books: Facial expressions, body language, voice tone... I guess I was thinking about my career.

SerializableAnswer.name: kung fu
SerializableAnswer.text: Now it feels a bit silly, but I always wanted to be the best martial artist. Now I have the weird feeling of having trained for thousands of hours on video tutorials on all relevant martial arts, and a metal ball the size of a wallnut inside my skull

SerializableAnswer.name: A metal arm
SerializableAnswer.text: I got a bionic arm! Like in the ancient movies! It is so cool! And hard to hide...

SerializableAnswer.name: Swiftness
SerializableAnswer.text: I sent my nervous system into overdrive with nanobots. Yes, I can move and strike inhumanly faster, but my colleagues are not inhumanly boring in meetings...

SerializableEvent.name: Keep watching
SerializableEvent.text: The vlogger repeated the mantra "Unnarmed, but heavily modified and impossibly coordinated, the 3rd of February of 2415 between 15:02 and 15:15, several Abrahamic Fundamentalists strangled and mauled to death several random civilians and proceeded to implode in crowded urban centers, with a death toll of 2476 citizens in an impossibly coordinated terrorist attack all across the European Federation. EF and FNA leadership are expected to announce new restrictions on body modifications..."

SerializableAnswer.name: Stop watching.
SerializableAnswer.text: Enough. I can't watch this anymore. Govtube, stop stream.

SerializableAnswer.name: What restrictions?
SerializableAnswer.text: I need to know, what is being illegalized?

SerializableEvent.name: Go to bed
SerializableEvent.text: Tomorrow I need to wake up early. I have take advantage of my office privilege.

SerializableEvent.name: Sleeping
SerializableEvent.text: This night, I will dream the same dream since the attacks: My modifications, my mistakes.

SerializableEvent.name: Dreaming
SerializableEvent.text: As many other nights, I dream of the clinic. Of the pain and the recovery. Of my loneliness

SerializableAnswer.name: empathy mod dream
SerializableAnswer.text: My empathy enhancement was a constant nightmare at first...

SerializableEvent.name: 0 - The Beginning
SerializableEvent.text: My head hurts. I think. Maybe it's just the stress from body modifications being made illegal because that bloody terrorist attack. Maybe it's because the mods affected my nervous system. Maybe this is how my new nervous system aches. So many options

SerializableAnswer.name: Need to watch govtube
SerializableAnswer.text: "Govtube, show me the latest on the terrorist attack"
